snippet: Twice former champion Rafael Nadal will not play at this year's Wimbledon due to the wrist injury that forced the Spaniard out of the French Open, he said on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Twice former champion Rafael Nadal will not play at this year's Wimbledon due to the wrist injury that forced the Spaniard out of the French Open, he said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Out of Wimbledon With Wrist Injury
headline.main: Nadal Out of Wimbledon With Wrist Injury
